definitions.title: vb. Hiph.
definitions.body: make empty, empty out (Ar. ra0qa (y) pour out, forth, intrans. (of water, blood, etc.); Aram. [[רִיק]] empty, pour, rop in deriv.; As rêḳu, empty);—Pf. 1 S. [[הֲרִי֫קׂתִי]] Le 26:33, Mal 3:10; 3 pl. [[חֵרִיקוּ]] Ez Eze 28:7, Eze 30:11; Impf. 3 ms. [[יׇרִיק]] Hb Hab 1:17, [[וַיׇּ֫רֶק]] Ge 14:14 (but v. infr.); Imv. ms. [[הָרֵק]] Ps 35:8; Inf. cstr. [[הָרִיק]] Is 32:6; Pt. pl. [[מְרִיקִים]] Ge 42:35, Zec 4:12;—
empty vessels Ge 42:35 (E) Je 48:12; keep empty, [[לְחֶרִיק נֶפֶשׁ רָעֵב]] Is 32:6 (i.e. keep hungry).
pour out or down, rain Mal 3:10, Ec 11:3, oil Zec 4:12.

empty out (i.e. draw) sword (cf. As. kakkê ittabbaku [pass.], Dl:HWB 699 b) Ex 15:9 (poem), Le 26:33 (H), Ez Eze 5:2, Eze 5:12, Eze 12:14, Eze 28:7, Eze 30:11; prob. also Hb Hab 1:17 ([[חרבו]] for [[חרמוֹ]] Gie We Now); of lance Ps 35:3; cf. (several.) [[וירק חניכיו]] Ge 14:14 (R) led forth, < Sam. [[וַיׇּ֫דֶק]] (Aram. [[דּוּק]] Aph. look) i.e. mustered LXX cf. Di al., [[אֲדִקֵּד]] Ball.— In Ps 18:43 LXX SyrVer Hup-Now Bae rd. [[אֲדִקֵּם]]; so ‖ 2Sa 22:43 MT; but De Dr < [[אֲרִיקֵם]] (v. [[דקק]]).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: be emptied out from vessel : Pf. 3 ms. [[הוּרק]] Je 48:11; Impf. 2 ms. [[תּוּרַק]] Ct So 1:3 (al. 3 fs.; of ointment, in sim.); cf. also Am 6:6, where Oort [[מוּרְקֵּי]] for [[מִזְרְקֵי]].
